entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hopewell
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:40 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 10:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening then changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then north 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
